subject: Replace hardcoded values with configurable properties
description: As a user, I want to be able to configure different values in the simulation such as start date and end date so I can change the simulation to fit my exact needs.

subject: Make GUI sounds configurable
description: As a user, I want to toggle the GUI sounds on or off so I can turn them off.

subject: Add business value to the simulation
description: As a user, I want to add business value to the user stories so I can see how that changes in the simulation.

subject: Add more user story keywords to simulation
description: As a developer, I want to add a larger variety of user stories so the user stories that are randomly generated are more diverse.

subject: Pause the simulation
description: As a user, I want to pause the simulation so I can inspect what is happening at any moment in time.

subject: Rewind the simulation
description: As a user, I want to rewind the simulation so I can inspect the previous state of things.

subject: Switch between "burn down" and "burn up" charts
description: As a user, I want to switch the chart between burndown and burnup so I can view progress in a way that makes sense to me.

subject: Add business value chart
description: As a user, I want to see a business value chart like the storypoints chart so I can measure progress in terms of BV.

subject: Import Taiga project via API
description: As a developer, I want to be able to access a public project on Taiga via the API.

subject: Log information to logfile
description: As a user, I want to output log information to a logfile instead of the console so I can review it later.

subject: Save Taiga API Credentials
description: As a Taiga user, I want to be able to save my Taiga credentials to the application so that I don't have to retype my credentials each time.

subject: Store project info from the Taiga API
description: As a developer, I want to store relevant information from the Taiga API so I can use it in the future.

subject: Load simulation using Taiga project
description: As a user, I want to load the simulation based on a real project on Taiga so that I can simulate that project.

subject: Add incremental step-through simulation feature
description: As a user, I want to step through the sprint simulation incrementally so that I can control the progress of the simulation.

subject: Fix "doneDay must not be less than startedDay" bug
description: As a user, I want to be able to click the start simulation button again after running a simulation without the exception occurring so this bug doesn't exist.

subject: Add menu bar to access features
description: As a user, I want a menu bar at the top of the simulation so I can access secondary features of the application.
